title: Senior Software Engineer, Backend
description: Develop and maintain scalable backend services using Python and Go. Design and implement APIs for high-traffic applications.
requirements: 5+ years in backend development, expertise in microservices architecture, strong knowledge of PostgreSQL.

title: Data Scientist, Machine Learning
description: Build and deploy predictive models to optimize trading strategies. Focus on time-series analysis and deep learning.
requirements: Ph.D. or M.S. in Computer Science/Statistics, proficiency in TensorFlow/PyTorch, experience with AWS SageMaker.

title: Frontend Developer (React/TypeScript)
description: Create responsive and performant user interfaces using React hooks and TypeScript. Collaborate closely with design teams.
requirements: 3+ years of React development, expert-level JavaScript/TypeScript, experience with state management libraries (Redux/Zustand).

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer (DevOps)
description: Manage and automate cloud infrastructure on AWS/GCP. Implement CI/CD pipelines using GitLab and Kubernetes.
requirements: Strong proficiency with Terraform/Ansible, deep understanding of Docker and Kubernetes orchestration, experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana).

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor security incidents, conduct vulnerability assessments, and develop robust security protocols across the enterprise.
requirements: 3+ years in InfoSec, CISSP or equivalent certification, hands-on experience with SIEM tools and penetration testing.

title: Product Manager, AI Features
description: Define the product roadmap for next-generation AI-powered features. Bridge the gap between engineering, data science, and business needs.
requirements: 5+ years in product management, proven track record shipping successful software products, strong familiarity with NLP/ML concepts.

title: Database Administrator (DBA)
description: Oversee the performance, integrity, and security of large SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, CockroachDB).
requirements: Expertise in query optimization, backup/recovery procedures, and replication strategies for high-availability environments.

title: Mobile App Developer (iOS - Swift)
description: Develop and maintain native iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI, ensuring excellent performance and adherence to Apple guidelines.
requirements: 4+ years experience developing consumer-facing iOS apps, familiarity with Core Data or Realm, experience with UI testing.

title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
description: Ensure system uptime and low latency for mission-critical distributed services. Focus on SLO/SLA management and incident response.
requirements: Experience automating infrastructure using Python/Bash, strong understanding of Linux kernel performance, familiarity with chaos engineering principles.

title: UX Researcher
description: Plan and execute qualitative and quantitative user research studies to inform design decisions for complex enterprise software.
requirements: 3+ years in UX research, proficiency in remote testing tools (UserTesting, Maze), strong analytical reporting skills.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create high-quality documentation, including API references, developer guides, and tutorials for a suite of cloud developer tools.
requirements: Experience writing for a technical audience, familiarity with Markdown and documentation generators (Docusaurus, Sphinx), basic Git proficiency.

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: Develop firmware for new IoT devices, optimizing memory and power consumption on ARM-based microcontrollers.
requirements: Expertise in C/C++, experience with RTOS (e.g., FreeRTOS), ability to read schematics and work with hardware debugging tools.

title: Solutions Architect, Cloud Security
description: Design and propose end-to-end secure cloud architectures (AWS focus) for major clients, ensuring compliance with industry regulations.
requirements: 10+ years in IT, multiple advanced cloud certifications (AWS Certified Security - Specialty preferred), excellent client-facing skills.

title: Game Programmer (Unreal Engine)
description: Develop core gameplay features and mechanics using C++ within the Unreal Engine framework.
requirements: Experience shipping at least one title, deep understanding of linear algebra and 3D mathematics, knowledge of Blueprints is a plus.

title: Director of Engineering, Platform
description: Lead and mentor multiple engineering teams responsible for core platform infrastructure, setting technical vision and standards.
requirements: 8+ years managing engineering teams, proven experience scaling high-availability services, M.S. in CS preferred.

title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Full-stack development utilizing the MERN stack to build responsive customer portals and internal tooling.
requirements: Strong competency in MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, experience with GraphQL integration.

title: Big Data Engineer (Spark/Scala)
description: Design, build, and optimize massive-scale data processing pipelines using Apache Spark and Scala/Python.
requirements: 3+ years working with distributed computing frameworks, strong grasp of data partitioning and partitioning techniques in large datasets.

title: AI Research Scientist, Generative Models
description: Conduct fundamental research into novel generative adversarial networks (GANs) and diffusion models for media synthesis.
requirements: PhD strongly preferred, significant publication record in top-tier ML conferences (NeurIPS, ICML), expertise in optimizing CUDA kernels.

title: Network Security Specialist
description: Manage and secure the corporate Wide Area Network (WAN), focusing on firewalls (Palo Alto/Check Point) and zero-trust implementation.
requirements: CCNP Security certification or equivalent, experience configuring SD-WAN solutions, familiarity with intrusion detection systems (IDS).

title: Technical Program Manager (TPM), Infrastructure
description: Drive complex, cross-functional technical projects related to global data center expansion and resource provisioning.
requirements: PMP or equivalent, exceptional organizational skills, ability to track interdependent tasks across 5+ engineering teams.

title: Marketing Technologist / MarTech Specialist
description: Integrate and manage marketing automation platforms (e.g., Marketo, HubSpot) with CRM systems (Salesforce).
requirements: Familiarity with Javascript for tag management (GTM), strong knowledge of GDPR/CCPA compliance in digital marketing.

title: Principal Systems Engineer (Linux Kernel)
description: Deep dive debugging and performance tuning of operating system behavior for low-latency trading environments.
requirements: 10+ years of specialized experience in Linux system internals, ability to modify/patch the kernel, mastery of performance profiling tools (perf).

title: Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description: Build robust end-to-end automation frameworks for web and mobile applications using Selenium/Cypress.
requirements: Proficiency in a scripting language (Java/Python), experience designing comprehensive test plans, familiarity with BDD methodologies.

title: Cloud Security Posture Manager
description: Implement and manage CSPM tools (e.g., Prisma Cloud, Orca Security) to continuously assess security compliance across multi-cloud environments.
requirements: Experience mapping controls to frameworks like NIST/ISO 27001, hands-on knowledge of cloud IAM roles and policies.

title: Telecommunications Software Engineer
description: Develop signaling software for 5G core networks, focusing on control plane efficiency and OAM interfaces.
requirements: Experience with 3GPP standards, knowledge of C++ for high-reliability telecom applications, understanding of virtualized network functions (VNF).

title: iOS Mobile Developer (Android - Kotlin)
description: Lead the development of the flagship Android application using modern Kotlin features and Jetpack Compose.
requirements: 4+ years in native Android development, strong understanding of the Android lifecycle, experience with Coroutines and RxJava.

title: Technical Consultant, ERP Systems
description: Advise large enterprise clients on migrating legacy ERP systems to modern cloud platforms (e.g., SAP S/4HANA).
requirements: 10+ years in enterprise consulting, functional and technical knowledge of at least one major ERP, excellent stakeholder management.

title: Lead Platform Engineer, API Gateway
description: Oversee the development and maintenance of the centralized API Gateway (e.g., Kong, Apigee) managing external access.
requirements: Extensive experience with high-throughput distributed systems, knowledge of OAuth2/OIDC implementation, expert use of Envoy Proxy.

title: Applied Scientist, Computer Vision
description: Research and deploy state-of-the-art computer vision models for real-time object detection in edge devices.
requirements: MS/PhD in CS/EE, mastery of PyTorch, experience with model quantization and optimization for NVIDIA/Edge TPUs.

title: Database Performance Analyst (SQL Server)
description: Identify and resolve bottlenecks in massive transactional SQL Server environments, focusing on indexing, stored procedures, and blocking issues.
requirements: Deep expertise in SQL Server internals (SSMS, Execution Plans), strong T-SQL tuning skills, experience with Always On Availability Groups.

title: Cloud Automation Engineer (Azure Focus)
description: Develop Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) templates and automation scripts using Azure Bicep/ARM templates and PowerShell.
requirements: AZ-400/AZ-500 certification required, strong background in PowerShell scripting, experience deploying complex services within Azure.

title: Security Software Engineer (Cryptography)
description: Implement and audit cryptographic primitives for secure key management and data at rest/in transit.
requirements: Solid academic background in applied mathematics/cryptography, experience with TLS implementation, expertise in Go or Rust for performance.

title: DevOps Manager, Release Engineering
description: Lead a team managing continuous deployment pipelines and artifact repositories (Artifactory, Nexus).
requirements: 3+ years managing release engineers, deep knowledge of GitFlow/Trunk Based Development, experience hardening deployment steps.

title: NoSQL Database Architect (Cassandra/DynamoDB)
description: Design efficient data models and replication strategies for large-scale, globally distributed NoSQL databases.
requirements: Extensive experience modeling complex data in DynamoDB or Cassandra, understanding of eventual consistency trade-offs.

title: Bioinformatics Software Developer
description: Develop scalable pipelines for processing next-generation sequencing data (FASTQ to VCF conversion).
requirements: Proficiency in Python/R, familiarity with bioinformatics file formats, experience with High-Performance Computing (HPC) job schedulers.

title: Front-End Architect, Performance Focus
description: Establish front-end performance standards (Core Web Vitals) and lead the migration toward modern frameworks.
requirements: 10+ years experience, expert in Web Vitals optimization, strong mentorship skills, proficiency with Webpack/Rollup configuration.

title: API Integrations Specialist
description: Manage connections and integration flows between hundreds of external business partners via REST and SOAP APIs.
requirements: Experience with integration platforms (MuleSoft, Dell Boomi), strong understanding of API versioning and documentation (OpenAPI/Swagger).

title: Quantum Computing Software Engineer
description: Develop algorithms and simulators for current-generation quantum processors using Qiskit or Cirq.
requirements: Advanced knowledge of quantum mechanics/information theory, Python proficiency, experience with high-performance computing simulation environments.

title: Lead Solutions Architect (Data Warehousing)
description: Design robust ETL/ELT pipelines and optimal dimensional models on cloud platforms (Snowflake/BigQuery).
requirements: Expertise in Kimball methodology, mastery of dbt for transformation, experience optimizing MPP database performance.

title: Cloud Cost Optimization Analyst
description: Monitor, analyze, and report on cloud spending (AWS/Azure), identifying optimization opportunities through reserved instances and rightsizing.
requirements: 2+ years experience with FinOps practices, proficiency with Cloudability/Harness, strong financial reporting skills.

title: Graphics Rendering Engineer
description: Optimize rendering pipelines for VR/AR applications, implementing advanced shaders and performance profiling using graphics APIs.
requirements: Expertise in OpenGL/Vulkan/DirectX, strong C++ skills, understanding of modern GPU architecture.

title: Technical Recruiter (Hardware Focus)
description: Source and close highly specialized technical talent in embedded systems, semiconductor design, and low-level software.
requirements: 5+ years recruiting experience, strong understanding of hardware engineering roles and terminology, experience working in high-volume pipelines.

title: API Product Manager (Internal Tools)
description: Manage the strategy and adoption of internal developer APIs, improving velocity for other engineering teams.
requirements: Technical background sufficient to interact with developers, experience prioritizing features based on developer friction points.

title: Technical Program Manager (TPM), Regulatory Compliance
description: Lead the execution roadmap for achieving and maintaining compliance certifications (e.g., FedRAMP, SOC 2 Type II).
requirements: Direct experience navigating complex regulatory audits, ability to translate compliance mandates into engineering tasks.

title: Field Support Engineer, Edge Computing
description: Provide on-site technical expertise for deploying and troubleshooting localized edge computing hardware at customer locations.
requirements: Willingness to travel up to 50%, strong networking fundamentals (routing/switching), experience with bare-metal deployments.

title: Backend Developer (Rust Focus)
description: Build high-performance, memory-safe services using Rust for tasks requiring extreme concurrency.
requirements: Prior experience with C++ or Go highly beneficial, proven experience writing idiomatic and production-ready Rust code.

title: Algorithm Engineer, Robotics Navigation
description: Develop and optimize Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) algorithms for autonomous vehicle control.
requirements: M.S./Ph.D. in Robotics/CS, expertise in C++, familiarity with sensor fusion techniques (LIDAR, IMU).

title: Systems Administrator (Hybrid Cloud)
description: Maintain and support both on-premises VMWare clusters and hybrid cloud components utilizing Azure Arc.
requirements: Expert-level VMWare administration (vCenter, HA/DRS), strong troubleshooting skills for physical and virtual infrastructure.
